metadata.Title: CVE-2022-28506 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - low.
metadata.Description: There is a heap-buffer-overflow in GIFLIB 5.2.1 function DumpScreen2RGB() in gif2rgb.c:298:45.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> invalid read of size 1, denial of service only ccdm94> as of 2022-06-22 there seems to be a proposed patch, however, it has yet to be merged by upstream. It also looks like the proposed patched was not created by upstream. 0xnishit> as of 2022-12-08, the proposed patch is not yet merged upstream. mdeslaur> as of 2023-09-15, the proposed patch is still not merged.

criterions.comment: giflib package in focal is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2023-09-15').
